pkgmetadata.longdescription: Concordance Based Bootstrap Methods for Outlier Detection in Survival Analysis // Three new methods to perform outlier detection in a survival context. In total there are six methods provided, the first three methods are traditional residual- based outlier detection methods, the second three are the concordance-based. Package developed during the work on the two following publications: Pinto J., Carvalho A. and Vinga S. (2015) doi:10.5220/0005225300750082; Pinto J.D., Carvalho A.M., Vinga S. (2015) doi:10.1007/978-3-319-27926-8_22.
